feed.title: Security Advisory for PHP packages hosted at packagist.org
feed.subtitle: Security Advisory for PHP packages hosted at packagist.org on GitHub

entry.title: [magento/community-edition] Magento 2 Community Edition Cryptographic Flaw
entry.content:
A cryptograhic flaw exists in Magento 2.1 prior to 2.1.18, Magento 2.2 prior to 2.2.9, Magento 2.3 prior to 2.3.2. A weak cryptograhic mechanism is used to generate the intialization vector in multiple security relevant contexts.

References

  • https://nvd.nist.gov/vuln/detail/CVE-2019-7886
  • https://web.archive.org/web/20220121011306/https://magento.com/security/patches/magento-2.3.2-2.2.9-and-2.1.18-security-update-33
  • https://github.com/advisories/GHSA-c2gg-rrhc-fvvg

entry.title: [magento/community-edition] Magento 2 Community Edition Cryptographic Flaw
entry.content:
A cryptographic flaw in Magento 2.1 prior to 2.1.18, Magento 2.2 prior to 2.2.9 and Magento 2.3 prior to 2.3.2 resulted in storage of sensitive information with an algorithm that is insufficiently resistant to brute force attacks.

References

  • https://nvd.nist.gov/vuln/detail/CVE-2019-7858
  • https://web.archive.org/web/20220121051916/https://magento.com/security/patches/magento-2.3.2-2.2.9-and-2.1.18-security-update-23
  • https://github.com/advisories/GHSA-7h8v-f2g9-39fx

entry.title: [magento/community-edition] Magento 2 Community Edition Weak PRNG
entry.content:
A cryptographically weak pseudo-rando number generator is used in multiple security relevant contexts in Magento 2.1 prior to 2.1.18, Magento 2.2 prior to 2.2.9, Magento 2.3 prior to 2.3.2.

References

  • https://nvd.nist.gov/vuln/detail/CVE-2019-7860
  • https://web.archive.org/web/20220121011306/https://magento.com/security/patches/magento-2.3.2-2.2.9-and-2.1.18-security-update-33
  • https://github.com/advisories/GHSA-8v9h-m7pj-hx7c

entry.title: [magento/community-edition] Magento 2 Community Edition XSS Vulnerability
entry.content:
A reflected cross-site scripting vulnerability exists in the Product widget chooser functionality in the admin panel for Magento 2.1 prior to 2.1.18, Magento 2.2 prior to 2.2.9, Magento 2.3 prior to 2.3.2.

References

  • https://nvd.nist.gov/vuln/detail/CVE-2019-7862
  • https://web.archive.org/web/20211206084839/https://magento.com/security/patches/magento-2.3.2-2.2.9-and-2.1.18-security-update-13
  • https://github.com/advisories/GHSA-m3v2-r236-5xgq

entry.title: [magento/community-edition] Magento 2 Community Edition IDOR Vulnerability
entry.content:
An insecure direct object reference (IDOR) vulnerability exists in the RSS feeds of Magento 2.1 prior to 2.1.18, Magento 2.2 prior to 2.2.9, Magento 2.3 prior to 2.3.2. This can lead to unauthorized access to order details.

References

  • https://nvd.nist.gov/vuln/detail/CVE-2019-7864
  • https://web.archive.org/web/20220121011306/https://magento.com/security/patches/magento-2.3.2-2.2.9-and-2.1.18-security-update-33
  • https://github.com/advisories/GHSA-c33v-23rx-7qqc

entry.title: [magento/community-edition] Magento 2 Community Edition XSS Vulnerability
entry.content:
A stored cross-site scripting vulnerability exists in the admin panel of Magento 2.1 prior to 2.1.18, Magento 2.2 prior to 2.2.9, Magento 2.3 prior to 2.3.2. This can be exploited by an authenticated user with access to manage orders and order status.

References

  • https://nvd.nist.gov/vuln/detail/CVE-2019-7867
  • https://web.archive.org/web/20220121051916/https://magento.com/security/patches/magento-2.3.2-2.2.9-and-2.1.18-security-update-23
  • https://github.com/advisories/GHSA-vx2g-f45p-j674

entry.title: [magento/community-edition] Magento 2 Community Edition CSRF Vulnerability
entry.content:
A cross-site request forgery (CSRF) vulnerability exists in the checkout cart item of Magento 2.1 prior to 2.1.18, Magento 2.2 prior to 2.2.9, Magento 2.3 prior to 2.3.2. This could be exploited at the time of editing or configuration.

References

  • https://nvd.nist.gov/vuln/detail/CVE-2019-7865
  • https://web.archive.org/web/20220121011306/https://magento.com/security/patches/magento-2.3.2-2.2.9-and-2.1.18-security-update-33
  • https://github.com/advisories/GHSA-wmrg-w9vg-7jqx

entry.title: [magento/community-edition] Magento 2 Community Edition CSRF Vulnerability
entry.content:
A cross-site request forgery (CSRF) vulnerability exists in the checkout cart item of Magento 2.1 prior to 2.1.18, Magento 2.2 prior to 2.2.9, Magento 2.3 prior to 2.3.2. This could be exploited at the time of editing or configuration.

References

  • https://nvd.nist.gov/vuln/detail/CVE-2019-7865
  • https://web.archive.org/web/20220121011306/https://magento.com/security/patches/magento-2.3.2-2.2.9-and-2.1.18-security-update-33
  • https://github.com/advisories/GHSA-wmrg-w9vg-7jqx
